name: Night Shift (itch) (FLUX28 STUDIO)
description:
Night Shift is an environmental awareness mini game

Explore the underwater world through the lens of a robot. Our seas are facing constant damaging threats from warmer temperatures, ocean pollution and melting ice caps.

NIGHT SHIFT is created for citizens of the world and people of all ages. It is inspired by the dire need to make Global Warming a larger awareness by tapping into 3 major topics under its umbrella. NIGHT SHIFT aims to spark interest and creativity through an engaging and experiential game for the general public.
